thought: To craft a pumpkin pie, I need to place a pumpkin, an egg, and sugar in the crafting grid. I have a pumpkin in slot 11, an egg in slot 31, and sugar in slot 18. I will first move the pumpkin to slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
